nodes.title: Selected File_Name
widgets_values: Free 4K Stock Videos & Full HD Video Clips to Download.mp4

nodes.title: 4) Upscaling
widgets_values:
• 4x Upscale Model - Choose from a variety of 1x,2x,4x or 8x model from the https://openmodeldb.info Website
Remember that 2x, 4x, 8x means it will upscale the original resolution x2, x4, x8 times.

Put the models here: ComfyUI\models\upscale_models


• 1x Refiner Model - You can use the 1x models here for refining the video first. 
if you don't want refinement, muting the node will give error, please reroute it manually.

nodes.title: JDCN - Custom Nodes
widgets_values:
Install from here: https://github.com/daxcay/ComfyUI-JDCN

These are new Custom nodes, made for the workflows made for patreon.

nodes.title: 2) Output
widgets_values:
• You can leave the connection as it is, it will automatically save the output in the same Original Directory of the source video. 

• Mute and use the use the Manual Path if you want. 

DO NOT MUTE THE "Auto Output to Same Folder nodes group."

nodes.title: 1) Inputs
widgets_values:
• Single Video Path - Right Click on the video and click "Copy as Path" and then paste the path in the Single Video Path Node

• Folder Input - Unmute the Nodes and Connect the reroute node to the Connect Path. Copy and Paste the Folder directory of the videos Folder. Select the video using the Selector Node. 

You can also filter out extensions if you want.

nodes.title: Lap Counter Important Note
widgets_values:
1) Set the Lap Counter to "Increment" to enable auto skipping feature else you won't progress. 

2) Go to Side Menu > Extra Options > Auto Queue (Changed) then Queue Prompt to render all your video frames. 


Make Sure to Put 0 in the Lap Counter before Starting for Final Render. 

Lap Counter: This is the new Feature; it increases the skip frames after every queue automatically according to the batch range set by you. 

It will take longer time to render 4k Video.

This upscale workflow works best on 720p or 1080p videos which are of any length of Duration and can convert up to 4k or 8k.  

How to Use: 

1) Input video path or folder in Group 1 - Input Video.
2) Set Output path (Auto or manual) in Group 2 - Set Outputs Path.
3) Set Video FPS and other settings in Group 3 - Video Settings. 
Set Lap Counter settings (See note neon red note) 

4) Set Upscaling models in Group 4 - Upscaling.
5) Video Frames will be saved in a Folder 
6) Sequence them using After Effects or any other editing software.

Min PC requirements - 16 GB Ram and 6GB GPU. [Use Lower Batch Range or Use 1_1) Video2Image Upscaler Using Model workflow]

• Collection of Upscaling workflows will be updated in the GDrive Folder: 

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-g8GjBdoJYlOsQI1MHZi1fJrGV7VAnmA?usp=sharing

My Other Workflows and Documented Tutorial: 

https://www.patreon.com/jerrydavos

----------------------------------------
Workflows By 
davos.jerry+contactai@gmail.com 
Jerry Davos

nodes.title: 3) Video Settings
widgets_values:
• Batch Range: Set the Batch Range - How much your PC can render at a time. Default is 15. 

Use Lower around 10 - 15 when doing a 1080p to 4k conversion, to prevent going out of memory. You can monitor CPU's Memory from Task manager > Performance > Memory and see what works for you. 

Do not downscale using force size, it introduces dicey pixels after upscale.

nodes.title: ERRORs Fix
widgets_values:
1) Out of Ram during UpscaleWithModel: Use Smaller Batch Range (10 - 15).

2) Out of Ram during Video Combine: Use 2x instead of 4x models to save ram, or Cap frames. Even better use 1_1) Video2Image Uspcaler using Model workflow

nodes.title: 5) Saving
widgets_values:
• Video Frames will be upscaled and saved in the Folder Named: "Frames" in the Same folder as the source video. 

• Sequence the frames in any editing software and Add audio. 

• It will take usually longer... around 10-20 minutes for 1 second of video (30 frames) to convert from 1080p to 8k. So, it is advised to test few frames if the results are satisfactory or not. 

• Also mind the disk space in the explorer, each frame will be around 20-30 MBs so It can take up storage pretty fast.

• Add a little sharpening to the frames in After Effects or to enhance the quality.

nodes.title: Unsupported Models
widgets_values:
See the Architecture type in the description of the Models:
Some of them are: 
• SPAN 
• Former 
• RGT ... etc
 which are not supported in comfyui and will give error. 

Make sure you download the ESRGAN, SwinIR, HAT... types of model in .pth format

groups.title: 1) Input Video   -  Single =  Select Video > Right click > "Copy as Path"    ||    Folder = Copy path from explorer
Resize the Group to fit the Font, Edit Color to (54,54,54)
